pullRequest.title: Use the right symbol for constant string placeholder
pullRequest.bodyText:
Constant string can be used as a placeholder and be patched to other
object. Set the flag on the symbol according to the actual object type.
Signed-off-by: Liqun Liu liqunl@ca.ibm.com

beforeCommit.message:
Use the right symbol for constant string placeholder

Constant string in customized LambdaForm method is just a placeholder
for MethodHandle object. Uset the right symbol on the load for
correctness.

Signed-off-by: Liqun Liu <liqunl@ca.ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Set the right flag on symbol for constant string placeholder

Constant string in customized LambdaForm method is just a placeholder
and can be patched to other object. Set the flag on the symbol according
to the actual object type.

Signed-off-by: Liqun Liu <liqunl@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Question - should this be recoverable? We can recover only with a non-AOT compile so wanted ot make sure this is the right semantics
Could you please update message numbers that come after this message?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -135,6 +135,7 @@ enum MessageType : uint16_t
    VM_isPrimitiveArray,
    VM_getAllocationSize,
    VM_getObjectClass,
+   VM_getObjectClassAt,

nodes.bodyText: Same here, please update message numbers.

commit.message:
Add getObjectClassAt

Add function getObjectClassAt to get class of an object stored at an
address.

Signed-off-by: Liqun Liu <liqunl@ca.ibm.com>
